ygData.subject: Re: Armor Sizing
ygData.msgSnippet: The blacksmithing book describes sizing of armor ... From: McConnell, Jeff  Hello All I have yet to see a large or small
ygData.messageBody:
The blacksmithing book describes sizing of armor

>>> "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...> 6.15.99 8:32:58 AM >>>
From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>



Hello All
I have yet to see a large or small size mold and for that matter a
medium size mold. The only mold I have seen doesn't tell its size on it. So
my questions are there different size molds or are there different combos
with a one size mold that produces different sizes.

Thanks
Silvermyst

P.S. Anyone know of any good smithing web sites
